exams.name: NSP OBC Scholarship
exams.eligibility: OBC students, family income < ₹3L, Class 11-12, enrolled in recognized institutions
exams.details: Central government scholarship for OBC students, ideal for your profile as an OBC student from Uttar Pradesh with a family income below ₹3 lakh. Supports academic expenses, renewable annually with satisfactory performance.
exams.applicationProcess: Register on NSP portal, select OBC scholarship, fill form, upload documents, submit before deadline.
exams.requiredDocuments: Income certificate (< ₹3L), OBC caste certificate, Class 10/11 mark sheets, Aadhaar card, bank passbook, bonafide certificate, photo.
exams.selectionCriteria: Eligibility based on OBC status, income verification, and enrollment. No entrance exam required.
exams.preparationTips: Ensure documents are valid and scanned clearly. Apply early to avoid server issues.
exams.additionalInfo: Disbursed via Direct Benefit Transfer (DBT). Renewable with minimum 50% marks.

exams.name: INSPIRE-SHE
exams.eligibility: Class 11-12 science students, top 1% in Class 10, interested in research
exams.details: INSPIRE Scholarship for Higher Education (SHE) supports science students, replacing KVPY. Perfect for your physics and research interests.
exams.applicationProcess: Apply online, submit Class 10/11 mark sheets, no entrance exam for SHE.
exams.requiredDocuments: Class 10/11 mark sheets, OBC certificate, Aadhaar, bank details, photo.
exams.selectionCriteria: Top 1% in Class 10 or equivalent merit-based selection.
exams.preparationTips: Maintain high marks in Class 10, ensure timely application.
exams.additionalInfo: Applications open July, deadline September 2025.

exams.name: PM Yashasvi Scholarship
exams.eligibility: Class 9-12, OBC/EBC/DNT, family income ≤ ₹2.5L, enrolled in recognized schools
exams.details: PM YASASVI scheme supports OBC students via Young Achievers Scholarship Award Test (YET). Ideal for your OBC status and income level.
exams.applicationProcess: Register on NTA portal, fill YET form, pay fee (if applicable), appear for offline exam (OMR-based).
exams.requiredDocuments: OBC certificate, income certificate (≤ ₹2.5L), Class 10/11 mark sheet, Aadhaar, admit card, school ID.
exams.selectionCriteria: YET performance (100 MCQs, 2.5 hours). Cut-off varies (typically 60-70%).
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT Class 10-11 for math, physics, GK. Practice YET sample papers.
exams.additionalInfo: Covers tuition/hostel fees. Renewable with 75% attendance.

exams.name: Swami Vivekananda Merit cum Means Scholarship
exams.eligibility: Class 9-postgraduate, family income < ₹2L, enrolled in recognized institutions
exams.details: State-level scholarship for meritorious students from economically weaker sections, suitable for your OBC status and income level.
exams.applicationProcess: Apply online via West Bengal Higher Education portal or NSP. Submit academic records, income certificate.
exams.requiredDocuments: Class 10/11 mark sheets, income certificate (< ₹2L), OBC certificate, Aadhaar, bank details.
exams.selectionCriteria: Merit-based (minimum 60% marks in Class 10), income verification required.
exams.preparationTips: Maintain high marks in Class 11. Ensure income certificate is valid.
exams.additionalInfo: Disbursed via DBT. Check state-specific deadlines.

exams.name: Genius Exam 2025
exams.eligibility: Class 11-12 students, open to all categories
exams.benefits: Up to ₹1,00,000 scholarship, career guidance, certificates
exams.details: National-level scholarship exam offering financial aid and mentorship, ideal for your academic profile and interests in physics, mathematics, and CSE.
exams.applicationProcess: Register online, pay ₹500, appear for online exam (MCQs, 2 hours).
exams.requiredDocuments: Class 10/11 mark sheets, school ID, OBC certificate, payment receipt.
exams.selectionCriteria: Based on exam performance (100 marks, typically 60% cut-off).
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT Class 11 syllabus, practice sample papers from Genius Exam website.
exams.additionalInfo: Exam in September, applications open June/July.

exams.name: UP Scholarship for OBC Students
exams.eligibility: OBC students, family income < ₹3L, Class 11-12, enrolled in Uttar Pradesh schools
exams.details: State-level scholarship for OBC students in Uttar Pradesh, covering tuition and living expenses. Highly relevant for your profile.
exams.applicationProcess: Register on UP Scholarship portal, select Post-Matric OBC, upload documents, submit.
exams.requiredDocuments: OBC certificate, income certificate (< ₹3L), Class 10/11 mark sheet, Aadhaar, bank details.
exams.selectionCriteria: Based on OBC status and income. No entrance exam.
exams.preparationTips: Check Uttar Pradesh scholarship portal for deadlines. Link bank account to Aadhaar.
exams.additionalInfo: Applications open July 2025. Renewable with 50% marks.

exams.name: NSEP Physics
exams.eligibility: Class 11-12, interested in physics, born after Dec 31, 2005
exams.details: National Standard Examination in Physics (NSEP) is the first stage for the International Physics Olympiad. Perfect for your physics interest.
exams.applicationProcess: Register via school or IAPT centers, pay ₹200, appear for offline exam (MCQs + subjective).
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, passport-size photo, fee receipt.
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT physics, HC Verma, past NSEP papers.
exams.additionalInfo: Exam in November at Kanpur centers.

exams.name: NSEC Chemistry
exams.eligibility: Class 11-12, interested in chemistry, born after Dec 31, 2005
exams.details: National Standard Examination in Chemistry (NSEC) leads to the International Chemistry Olympiad. Adds credentials for PCM students.
exams.applicationProcess: Register via school, pay ₹200, attend offline exam (MCQs).
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, photo, fee receipt.
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT chemistry, past papers.
exams.additionalInfo: Held with NSEP. Check IAPT for Kanpur centers.

exams.name: NSEB Biology
exams.eligibility: Class 11-12, interested in biology, born after Dec 31, 2005
exams.details: National Standard Examination in Biology (NSEB) for International Biology Olympiad. Adds academic diversity.
exams.applicationProcess: Register via school, pay ₹200, appear for MCQ exam.
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, photo, fee receipt.
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT biology, focus on genetics, ecology.
exams.additionalInfo: Conducted with NSEs. Verify Kanpur centers.

exams.name: NSEA Astronomy
exams.eligibility: Class 11-12, interested in astronomy, born after Dec 31, 2005
exams.details: National Standard Examination in Astronomy (NSEA) for International Astronomy Olympiad. Relevant for astrophysics.
exams.applicationProcess: Register via school, pay ₹200, attend offline exam (MCQs + theory).
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, photo, fee receipt.
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT physics, astronomy books, past papers.
exams.additionalInfo: Exam in November. Check IAPT for Kanpur centers.

exams.name: IOQM
exams.eligibility: Class 8-12, interested in mathematics, born after Jul 31, 2005
exams.details: Indian Olympiad Qualifier in Mathematics (IOQM) is the first stage for the International Mathematical Olympiad. Ideal for your mathematics interest.
exams.applicationProcess: Register via school or MTA, pay ₹300, appear for offline exam (subjective).
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, photo, fee receipt.
exams.selectionCriteria: Top 300-400 per region qualify for INMO (100 marks).
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT math, RMO papers, focus on algebra, geometry.
exams.additionalInfo: Exam in September at Kanpur centers.

exams.name: NTSE (Stage 1)
exams.eligibility: Class 10 students, open to all categories
exams.details: National Talent Search Examination (NTSE) Stage 1 is for Class 10 students, but qualifiers receive scholarships in Class 11-12.
exams.applicationProcess: Apply via UP exam authority, pay ₹50-₹100, appear for MAT and SAT exams.
exams.requiredDocuments: Class 10 mark sheet, OBC certificate, school ID, photo.
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT Class 9-10, practice mental ability, science, math.
exams.additionalInfo: Stage 1 in November, Stage 2 by NCERT in May 2026.

exams.name: ZIO
exams.eligibility: Class 12 or below, interested in coding
exams.details: Zonal Informatics Olympiad (ZIO) is a coding contest for the International Olympiad in Informatics. Perfect for your CSE interest.
exams.applicationProcess: Register online, pay ₹300, appear for offline programming exam.
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, photo, fee receipt.
exams.preparationTips: Practice C++/Python, solve past ZIO problems, focus on algorithms.
exams.additionalInfo: Exam in November at Kanpur centers.

exams.name: ZCO
exams.eligibility: Class 12 or below, interested in coding
exams.details: Zonal Computing Olympiad (ZCO) is an online coding contest, complementing ZIO. Ideal for your CSE interest.
exams.applicationProcess: Register online, pay ₹300, submit code online.
exams.requiredDocuments: School ID, birth certificate, photo, fee receipt.
exams.preparationTips: Practice competitive programming, solve past ZCO problems.
exams.additionalInfo: Online exam in November.

exams.name: CodeChef Starters
exams.eligibility: Open to all, interested in programming
exams.details: Monthly coding contests by CodeChef, ideal for your CSE interest. Builds programming skills.
exams.applicationProcess: Register on CodeChef, participate in monthly online contests.
exams.preparationTips: Practice on CodeChef, focus on data structures, algorithms.
exams.additionalInfo: Free to participate. Multiple contests throughout 2025.

exams.name: SOF IMO
exams.details: Science Olympiad Foundation International Mathematics Olympiad (SOF IMO) tests math skills.
exams.applicationProcess: Register via school, pay ₹150, appear for offline exam (MCQs).
exams.preparationTips: Study NCERT math, practice SOF IMO papers.
exams.additionalInfo: Exam in December at school.

exams.name: SOF NSO
exams.details: Science Olympiad Foundation National Science Olympiad (SOF NSO) tests physics, chemistry, and biology.

exams.eligibility: Class 12 or below, interested in programming
exams.details: Global coding contest by TCS, ideal for your CSE interest. Offers internship opportunities.
exams.applicationProcess: Register online, participate in online coding rounds.
exams.selectionCriteria: Top performers in rounds qualify for finals.
exams.preparationTips: Practice competitive programming, focus on algorithms.
exams.additionalInfo: Season 11 expected in July 2025.

exams.eligibility: Open to all, interested in programming

exams.applicationProcess: Register online, participate in online rounds.
exams.preparationTips: Practice on Google Code Jam, focus on algorithms.
exams.additionalInfo: Multiple rounds in 2025.

exams.details: National Level Science Talent Search Examination (NSTSE) by Unified Council, ideal for your physics and research interests.
exams.applicationProcess: Register online or via school, pay ₹300, appear for offline exam (MCQs).

fairs.name: IRIS National Fair
fairs.details: Initiative for Research and Innovation in Science (IRIS) is a national fair for science projects, perfect for your physics and research interests.
fairs.applicationProcess: Submit project online, pay ₹500, present at regional/national fair.
fairs.requiredDocuments: Project abstract, school ID, OBC certificate, fee receipt.
fairs.selectionCriteria: Judged on innovation, scientific rigor (100 marks).
fairs.preparationTips: Develop a physics/CSE project, practice presentation.
fairs.additionalInfo: Fair in December, applications open August.

fairs.name: Regeneron ISEF
fairs.details: International Science and Engineering Fair (ISEF) is a global platform for science projects, ideal for your research goals.
fairs.applicationProcess: Qualify via IRIS, submit project, attend international fair.
fairs.requiredDocuments: Project report, IRIS certification, passport for travel.
fairs.preparationTips: Refine IRIS project, prepare for international judging.
fairs.additionalInfo: Fair in May, US-based. Travel grants available.

fairs.name: Conrad Challenge
